caption: Love Charley's in Bowie Town Center!  Awesome Philly Steaks.  A great add to the shopping center.
This was my 3rd time visiting this location, each time my fries were cold and soggy. The cheese sauce couldn’t help. They need to fix this. Especially if I’m only ordering fries. I do not recommend

They canceled an order during lunch time. Then I called them and they said it was Doordash fault and everything is fine on their side. Checked all the other apps and all said closed (right in the middle of lunch). This is the blueprint of how you should not run a business. Why would you close your restaurant during lunch? Cancel orders and then don't inform anyone at the restaurant so they can communicate why? If it's busy then at least tell them to tell us you're busy and cannot accommodate any online orders. I did not know they canceled my DoorDash order so I checked 20 mins later to find out that it was cancelled. I could have had lunch by then.

*Update * I gave them a try again (3 different times)and I’m glad I did. No long wait times and food has been good.  ........... Opening week - I ordered online and had to wait over 1 hour to get my food once I got there for pickup. Food was good, but not worth the 1 hour wait.

2nd time visiting this Charley’s at the Bowie Town Center and the experience and food was great. We definitely noticed that they have worked out some of those “new restaurant kinks”. We were greeted at the door as we walked in. Order was correct and food was great!  Great service with no complaints. We will definitely visit this Charley’s again!

Order #02209 For Malik Missing Fries And Drink From Cali Chicken Combo, Missing Cookies For The 2 Kids Meals Somebody Is Not Reviewing These Bags Before They Go Out As Well As Incorrect Drink I Got A Sprite I Ordered A Orange Fanta
Gross food soaked in fat, waited over an hour to get my food. Why go here if you could just get some steakems and a hoagie roll.
Horrible & slow service. Dont waste your time.

I have been waiting for a Charleys to come to my area for years! I first had it in ATL. The only other one in the area was on Fort Meade base. The new Bowie location gave great customer and the food was great as always

After reading so many negative reviews I am so glad I tried them anyway! (Not too mention desperately wanting to spend my money in my county.) I ordered my food online, was told it would be ready in five minutes, got there 15 minutes later and it was ready. There were quite a few people inside - a good problem in my opinion. Upon my entrance I was greeted by Kevin, gave him my order number, he handed me my food, thanked me for my business and even opened the door to let me out. Great customer service!!! My order was totally correct and delicious too!
Horrible never again     how hard is it read.  No pepper or salt
Compared to the first weeks, when they were working the kinks out. This is 100% much better great customer service from Kaia and Johnny. Quick turn around completely satisfied

I feel like this place has great potential. It's VERY BUSY!!!! My mobile order was ready 15 min after the set time. Don't come for the customer service. The fries reminds me of five guys and the sandwich tastes how i expected it to. They don't have any qualities that stand out from the next guy.

So far, my experiences have been excellent. All my online orders were executed correctly and ready on time as specified. Food is top notch and prepared very well. Definitely have my forever patronage.
If the box for the Gourmet Fries could be a bit stronger. The box have gotten soggy very quickly and started falling out of the box getting all over the bag.

The two times I’ve ordered here, it has taken over an hour. The workers make their own food and start to eat.. meanwhile there are still customers out in the cold waiting for their food. They take forever to finish orders, it’s unacceptable.

Horrible service, they take way too long to serve food. I ordered and I waited over an hour to receive  my food! The workers move way too slow. They need faster cooks, the cooks were even arguing right in front the customers!

I ordered online tonight and my order was to be ready in 7 mins per the website. We went there and the line was so long! My poor husband stood outside in the freezing cold with all of the other patrons for over an hour!!! That is totally unacceptable especially for a sub place! When he finally got the order, there was no "sorry for the wait" not even an offer for a free sub for the next visit.  I have no complaints about the food but if this place is so busy then the online order wait times needs to be realistic or not at all.  We will wait to revisit once the hype wears down but no time in the dead of winter!

New place, I understand there will be some waiting in order to get my food but I placed an order for pickup and was not ready even an HOUR AFTER I HAD PLACED THE ORDER. There is just a big cluster of people waiting for their food in which there’s no order and the employees just look lost! This isn’t the first time I’ve had to wait for the food too!

If I could rate lower than a one I would. I Ordered food online and then waited over an hour outside in the cold. I will NEVER return no matter how good the food is. What a waste of my my time. I see several of the same complaints.  Please fix this problem or you'll be out of business like many other franchises.

Decided to wait a week or two for Charley's to get the "grand opening kinks" sorted out. Ordered online for pickup and although I was notified my order was ready, I had to wait about 25 additional minutes for it, so the kinks remain. The store was full inside to its limited COVID capacity, so I had to wait outside with a few other patrons. However, in the end, it was worth it! My order was correct even down to my request for ranch dressing on the side (I honestly was afraid it would be incorrect), fresh, well presented, and delicious! This is the first time I've ever tried Charley's but it won't be the last! Until all of the kinks are worked out, however, I'll try to stay away from rush hours like the Friday evening I went. Photo: Chicken cheesesteak with everything and ultimate fries (with ranch dressing not shown on the side).

Order at 11:30am it's 1:10pm still haven't received my food and they will not pickup the phone😑.  Please get a structure down so things can be more efficient.  This place serves good food, but alot of customers are upset 😡 for the long wait.
Messed up my order for uber eats but they fixed it immediately so i am satisfied. They are new so i get it..everyone is still training. Great to see a diverse urban staff!

I know they are fairly new and all, but I waited for an hour after placing my order, just to get ONE sandwich. On top of that there is no kind of structure or organization. At least the lettuce and tomato was fresh.

I was very impressed with my service and food on Thursday. I arrived at 2:30pm placed my order for two sandwiches and two drinks and was out the door at 2:46pm; that's good service!!. My order was correct and the food was delicious as well. I realize from other comments that things were slow in the beginning which can happen when a restaurant first open.  However things have improved and I am happy to say I am a satisfied customer.
food is good but I hated that I did not get my whole order not driving back that was inconvenient
It took forever but the food was actually pretty good. Since they are new I will give them another chance. Reminds of Jerry Sub.
Ordered online 45 minutes ahead of time.  Arrived 5 minutes after scheduled pickup time.  Received order 27 minutes after scheduled pickup time.  Go when you are not hungry.  The food is good though.

Was so excited about this place opening closer to home, and went with my boyfriend to get some food...the food was great BUT we waited almost 2 hrs to receive it. Our order was skipped, and it wasn’t until one of the employees up front recognized how long we had been there and she told those making the food that they had skipped over our order. The man and young woman on the grill were SUPER slow at getting subs out. The man looked confused as he was reading orders on the monitor and kept messing up the orders. The young girl had to keep throwing out perfectly good philly steak and chicken bc orders kept being messed up. The manager did absolutely nothing to help speed up and facilitate the process. All she did was stare at them, even after the young lady on the grill expressed her frustration about her grillmate who clearly was not making the job any easier. I was very upset about how long our food took, there were so many employees just standing around looking confused. This place needs to do better or I can’t see it succeeding here at all. I so badly wanted to just get a refund and leave, but I couldn’t help but feel bad for all those employees who are clearly just under bad management and looked as though they needed more training.

Terrible fast food restaurant. Sign says only 10 people inside, there were more than 20 including employees. Employees don’t wear masks properly. Some of them with masks below their nose. Waited over 45 min for my food. Go to the one in Annapolis Mall, better/faster service. Plus they follow COVID 19 safety better.

Their was 0 communication with the customers and the staff. You are not told how long the wait is, you are not asked to provide your number for when your order is ready. I had to initiate & orchestra the completion of my order by continuously going to the counter and checking the status of my order. I waited for a hour and a half just for 3 subs and some wigs.

Place is slow. Wait was over an hour. Manager hid in the back and refused to come out to deal with customers. Left their employees in the front to be berated by customers. I won't come back. Will eat at Pot Belly's or one of the other restaurants.

I know it's new to Bowie Towne so I expected the wait to be long and it was worth it. I ordered online and waited a little longer to go in because I seen that it was a mad rush at the door! Still waited about 10 min when I got in, but hey.. . The food is better than what was there before and hopefully they get things in order for the complainers. Welcome to Bowie Charley's.. . I will definitely return.

Horrible. Placed an order online uber eats could not pick up because it wasn’t ready within the selected time frame . I called the store several times to see if they had even received my order and nobody answered . I ended up coming to the  store to pick up the order myself and was greeted by a very rude manager who was essentially yelling at me because I needed to wait 30 minutes ( after waiting an hour plus AND picking up my own food that was supposed to be delivery ) because they still hadn’t got to my name on the list . I am not upset that the order was going to take longer than expected . I am upset at the tone and demeanor in which I was approached with the given situation ... and this is after waiting over an hour, calling the restaurant several times , and having to come in person ; only to leave without any food . Customer service is EVERYTHING. During these trying times , I would be trying to keep my customers happy , not turn them away especially being a new business in Bowie Town Center ...
The worst ! Placed an order online and didn’t get nothing on all sandwiches but steak 😑. They didn’t know nobody order either ! I had to redo everything and still got nothing !
Very delicious. There was fast, efficient, and courteous service.
